mapper.insert: insert into route (routeID, routeName, provinceID, cityID, midProvince, midCity, endProvince, endCity, transportPrice, COMMENT) values (#{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update route set routeName = #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceID = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityID = #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midProvince = #{midprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endProvince = #{endprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select routeID, routeName, provinceID, cityID, midProvince, midCity, endProvince, endCity, transportPrice, COMMENT from route where routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select routeID, routeName, provinceID, cityID, midProvince, midCity, endProvince, endCity, transportPrice, COMMENT from route
